name: 魏敏樺
schedule:
1. First-Order Differential Equations
1.1 Basic Concepts and Ideas
1.2 Separable Differential Equations
1.3 Exact Differential Equations. Integrating Factors
1.4 Linear Differential Equations. Bernoulli Equation
2. Linear Differential Equations of Second and Higher Order
2.1 Homogeneous Linear Equations of Second Order
2.2 Second Order Homogeneous Equations with Constant Coefficients
2.3 Case of Complex Roots. Complex Exponential Function
2.4 Euler-Cauchy Equation
2.6 Nonhomogeneous Equations
2.7 Solution by Undetermined Coefficients
2.8 Solution by Variation of Parameters
3. System of Differential Equations, Phase Plane, Qualitative Methods
3.1 Vectors, Matrices, Eigenvalues
3.2 Homogeneous Systems with Constant Coefficients.
3.3 Qualitative Methods for Nonlinear Systems
3.4 Nonhomogeneous Linear System
4. Laplace Transforms
4.1 Laplace Transform. Inverse Transform. Linearity. Shifting
4.2 Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals. Differential Equations
4.3 Unit Step Function. Second Shifting Theorem, Dirac’s Delta Function
4.4 Differential and Integration of Transforms
4.6 Partial Fractions. Differential Equations
